summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 29 January to end of Saturday 29 January GMT
description: A strong westerly breeze will be a feature of Saturday's weather. Good local dispersion is expected while the incoming maritime air will carry little by way of imported pollution.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
